document_data.mainbody: '''Time domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with time-related [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: They gained the ability to respond quicker at the start of a fight.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[true strike]]'', ''[[gentle repose]]'', and ''[[haste]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[freedom of movement]]'', ''[[permanency]]'', and ''[[contingency]]''. Those that were masters in this domain had access to ''[[moment of prescience]]'',<ref group="note">This was originally ''mass haste'' for 3rd edition. ''[[foresight]]'', and ''[[time stop]]''.
